@import "bourbon-ui-forms";

Add the following variables to your base variables stylesheet and customize to your liking:

$form-border-color:       #ccc;
$form-border-color-focus: #56B4EF; //blue
$form-border-color-hover: #aaa;
$form-border-radius:      3px;
$form-box-shadow-focus:   darken($form-border-color-focus, 5%);
$form-font-family:        $lucida-grande;
$form-font-size:          12px;
